attributes.action: Because his wife is outraged is NOT sufficient reason for the PM to take this country to war.
attributes.additional_details: It is reliably reported that, like Blair, David Cameron is taking this country into war ONLY because he promised somebody (his wife) that he would 'do something' about Syria's violation of human rights.  We need Cameron to come clean on this AND we need to know if the people of this land - through a legally binding referendum - consider that sufficient reason to go to war.  An upset wife is NOT legal justification for war, Mr Attorney General.
